    Class and Description
    AbstractLocalizationProvider
    Class serving as a localization provider.
    ILocalizationListener
    Interface used to define the only method required to implement a Localization Listener.
    ILocalizationProvider
    Interface used to define method needed to implement a LocalizationProvider.
    LocalizationProvider
    Singleton class used to provide the program with the adequate Strings depending on the active localization.

    Interface used to define the only method required to implement a Localization Listener.
    ILocalizationProvider
    Interface used to define method needed to implement a LocalizationProvider.

    Class used as a bridge between the localization provider and the registered listeners.
